casebody.data:
SMITH
v.
HUBBARD. No. 505P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State/Hubbard.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of October 2007 by Petitioner for Appointment of Counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of October 2007."
